body_html:
My comment is still valid and has not been acted on:

"without new unit tests, it is impossible to assess the effect of the fix or whether it does fix the issue. Please add a series of unit tests that assert that the new behavior is the one we expect (see discussion). These should be tests that would have been previously failing and would now be passing."

Since it has been a while, I consider the PR abandoned and I will close the PR. Feel free to reopen later, with unit tests.
body_text:
My comment is still valid and has not been acted on:
"without new unit tests, it is impossible to assess the effect of the fix or whether it does fix the issue. Please add a series of unit tests that assert that the new behavior is the one we expect (see discussion). These should be tests that would have been previously failing and would now be passing."
Since it has been a while, I consider the PR abandoned and I will close the PR. Feel free to reopen later, with unit tests.
body:
My comment is still valid and has not been acted on:

"without new unit tests, it is impossible to assess the effect of the fix or whether it does fix the issue. Please add a series of unit tests that assert that the new behavior is the one we expect (see discussion). These should be tests that would have been previously failing and would now be passing."

Since it has been a while, I consider the PR abandoned and I will close the PR. Feel free to reopen later, with unit tests.
